hits.Title: Impostor
hits.Description: A spaceship is travelling in endless space, and its crew is trying to survive. There is an impostor among them and they need to stay on guard. The Impostor wants to kill everyone and will stop at nothing, even if it means sabotaging the ship. He can hide in dark corners and wait for his victim, or suddenly jump out of a ventilation shaft and attack from behind. It is difficult to identify him among the crew members, unless he makes a mistake. You wouldn't do that, would you, Impostor?
hits.Instructions: Control the movement with WASD or arrow keys. Perform actions by clicking the buttons at the bottom right corner of the screen.
hits.Key Features: Play as impostor in a fan game inspired by Among Us. Be cunning, avoid getting exposed and deal with the crew members. After all, they all must die. And you must remain the only survivor.

hits.Title: Rummikub
hits.Description: The original Rummikub is one of the most popular family games in the world.The unique combination of tactical thinking, luck and tense competition has made this classic family game into one of the most successful games for the past 70 years! Arrange the tiles to create the smartest color and number combinations. Will you be the first player to place all tiles and win the match?
hits.Instructions: Select your tiles from the rack and place them on the board. Be the first player to place all of the tiles to win!

hits.Title: Sprunki Find The Differences

Unleash Your Detective Skills with Sprunki Find The Differences!
Inspired by the charming world of Sprunki, this game takes your observation skills to the next level. Dive into beautifully crafted scenes filled with vibrant details, where your task is to spot the differences between two seemingly identical images.
Whether you're a fan of Sprunki or just love a good brain teaser, Sprunki Find The Differences offers a perfect mix of challenge and fun for players of all ages

hits.Key Features:
Challenging Levels: Explore a variety of levels with increasing difficulty, each designed to test your attention to detail.
Unique Themes: Discover differences across diverse scenes, from playful landscapes to intricate puzzles.

Earn Rewards: Complete levels to unlock achievements and earn in-game bonuses.

hits.Key Features:
1. Unique Kitchen-Themed Tracks
Prepare to embark on a one-of-a-kind racing adventure as you navigate through creatively designed tracks inspired by various kitchen elements. Zoom past the coffee maker, swerve around towering cereal boxes, and race through the twists and turns of utensil mazes.

2. Miniature Remote-Controlled Cars
Select your favorite miniature car from a diverse fleet of tiny speedsters. Each car has unique attributes, such as speed, handling, and acceleration, making it essential to choose the perfect ride to match your racing style.

3. Realistic Physics
Experience the thrill of realistic physics as your tiny car responds to every turn, drift, and jump. The dynamic environment and interactive elements make each race a heart-pounding adventure.

4. Upgrades and Unlockables
Earn points and coins from races to unlock new cars, power-ups, and special tracks. Upgrade your cars to boost their performance and enhance your chances of victory in the kitchen mayhem.

5. Fun for All Ages
Fastlane Frenzy is an all-ages game that brings families and friends together for hours of laughter, competition, and excitement. It's an accessible and enjoyable experience for kids and adults alike.

hits.Title: The Walking Deadblocks
hits.Description: A fast-paced, cooperative survival game where players battle relentless waves of zombies across dynamic day-night cycles. Survive as long as possible by managing resources, unlocking new maps, and utilizing unique character abilities. Nights bring increased danger with randomized enemy spawns, challenging players to strategize using generators and lights to stay alive.
hits.Instructions:
•	Single Player Mode:
          o	Movement: W, A, S, D
          o	Shooting: SPACE
          o	Weapon Switching: Use Q, E, or keys 1-5
•	Co-op Mode:
          o	Player 1:
                 	Movement: Arrow keys
                 	Shooting: L
                 	Weapon Switching: Use "," and "."
          o	Player 2:
                 	Movement: W, A, S, D
                 	Shooting: SPACE
                 	Weapon Switching: Use Q and E
hits.Key Features:
The game is a single-player and co-op PvE shooter. It is a survival game featuring a wave system and a dynamic day/night cycle. Each wave incorporates a looping 24-hour system with five distinct times of day, where enemy spawn rates vary. Mornings are easier, while nights introduce randomized enemy spawns for added tension.

There are three types of enemies:

Zombies: Slow, small melee enemies with low damage.
Infectious: Ranged enemies with area-of-effect attacks.
Chargers: Large, fast melee enemies that deal high damage.
Players can choose from four distinct characters, each with unique abilities:

Wrench: Deploys a turret.
Glimmer: Deploys a light tower.
Dash: Deploys an electric trap that slows down enemies.
Sentinel: Deploys a shield.

Common items include seven types of weapons and four types of deployables:

Weapons: Pistol, Uzi, Shotgun, Rocket Launcher, Sniper Rifle, Flamethrower, Grenade Launcher 
Deployables:Wall, Barrel, C4, Mines.

The game features three different maps. One map is free to play, while the other two must be unlocked by collecting points earned in the currently accessible maps. Points are accumulated by defeating enemies.

hits.Key Features:

Offline Multiplayer: Enjoy offline gameplay with friends and family, encouraging social interaction and cooperative play.

Unique Objectives: Fulfill specific objectives based on your chosen character—find your child, collect chocolates, apprehend the thief, or evade capture as the thief.

Family-Friendly Fun: Suitable for all ages, 'Hide & Seek - Family Edition' promotes bonding and laughter among players.

Nostalgic Appeal: Capture the essence of childhood games with modern twists, appealing to both new players and those seeking nostalgia.

Easy to Play, Hard to Master: Simple controls make it accessible for everyone, while deeper gameplay mechanics offer challenges for experienced gamers.

hits.Title: Minesweeper, a Classic puzzle game
hits.Description: The classic, old fashioned, minesweeper game. If you are a nostalgic minesweeper player, you will love this one. It is fully customizable, what are you waiting for? Play it right now!
hits.Instructions:
The goal is to find and mark all the mines hidden under the green squares. This is done by clicking on the squares to open them. Each square will have:
1) A mine, and if you click on it you'll lose the game.
2) A number, which tells you how many of its adjacent squares have mines in them.
3) Nothing. In this case you know that none of the adjacent squares have mines, and they will be automatically opened as well.
Music by Oki ajah, sfx by opengameart.org. Thanks to alextro for sharing the code!
